reviewText: This really is a very good insight into the Los Angeles Beach Bike Path. I had lived in Venice and didn't realise how far the path stretches and this shows me. The Host Angel Reed is the girlfriend of Constantine Maroulis, the AMerican Idol Season 4 Runner Up and lead in the Broadway Hit Rock of Ages. Angel Reed is a dancer in that performance. That aside if you want a bright and sunny look at a great thing to do when you visit Los Angeles this is one way to enjoy a day, you can't go wrong!
